metadata.title: CVE-2022-33746 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: P2M pool freeing may take excessively long The P2M pool backing secondlevel address translation for guests may be of significant size. Thereforeits freeing may take more time than is reasonable without intermediatepreemption checks. Such checking for the need to preempt was so farmissing.

criterions.comment: xen package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
